timeline.message: MULE-17874: SDK Should not reject dynamic metadata resolution when an optional key is null
MULE-17874: SDK Should not reject dynamic metadata resolution when an optional key is null

timeline.bodyText: What if keyParts is empty? Will this say that the key is required?
timeline.author: ndinu

timeline.bodyText: I think that this should fail if key is required. It looks like this will fail when key is not required.
timeline.author: ndinu
